description: Maps a URL and returns the results.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: The API key to use Firecrawl API.

inputs.name: urls
inputs.info: List of URLs to create maps from (separated by commas or new lines).

inputs.name: ignore_sitemap
inputs.info: When true, the sitemap.xml file will be ignored during crawling.

inputs.name: sitemap_only
inputs.info: When true, only links found in the sitemap will be returned.

inputs.name: include_subdomains
inputs.info: When true, subdomains of the provided URL will also be scanned.
